properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 12 at 3:27PM EST until February 13 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Mount Holly NJ
properties.description:
* WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations
of up to two inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth
of an inch.

* WHERE...The southern Poconos.

* WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 6 AM EST Thursday. A wintry mix
will change to freezing rain later tonight then to rain by
daybreak Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions, especially bridges
and other elevated surfaces.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The majority of the snow and freezing rain
amounts will be more likely in elevations above 1,000 feet.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM EST THURSDAY
